name: Clash of Legends
description:
Clash of Legends is a new adventure game where you battle to build an empire and control 7 mythical kingdoms! You'll love this base building, fighting army game where you must conquer kingdoms of legends to survive!

Join thousands of empires in the war for control of the 7 kingdoms in this base- building strategy game! Build armies, attack enemies, research goods and gather resources to become the most powerful player!
